name: Celebrity Beard Salon - Hairy Beard Salon & Mustache Makeover At Barber Shop
name_original: Celebrity Beard Salon - Hairy Beard Salon & Mustache Makeover At Barber Shop
description:
Hey Boys ! Do you all want to look handsome at your finger tip?
Welcome to beard salon, clean your hairy face and shave yourself.
Use different tool to shine his face.
Give different look to man with mustache, french beard or clean shave.
Shaving is so easy that you didn’t need to go to barber shop, learn here and apply.
Wash your face with soap, apply shaving cream on it and just shave it.
So simple is it? Then what are you waiting for? Com and try shaving your beard.

Features:
=> Tools like trimmer, razor, scissor, shave cream are used.
=> After shaving give handsome look to yourself.
=> Spectacular glasses, attractive mustache designs, beard patterns.
=> Easy to play.
